EXCURSION_POLICY.TITLE: Helpful Information for All Excursions

POINTS.1: Please ensure the date on the excursion ticket is correctly written.
POINTS.2: If you have changed rooms or hotels from what is stated on the ticket, please contact your hotel tour guide to make the change.
POINTS.3: Pickup for all excursions takes place in the entrance area of your hotel.
POINTS.4: For pickups before 07:30, please request a wake-up call at reception by 18:00 and inquire about breakfast options.
POINTS.5: For excursions with flights or overnight stays and trips to the Sinai Peninsula, you need your passport. Please wear long pants when visiting the monastery.
POINTS.6: Drinks with meals are not included in the price.
POINTS.7: Please do not leave valuables (camera, money, etc.) in the bus during sightseeing.
POINTS.8: Please remember: water bottles, sunscreen, comfortable shoes, head covering, and for long journeys, a pillow.
POINTS.9: For excursions that go until evening, you need something to wear over your clothes.
POINTS.10: For desert and snorkeling excursions, you will receive a safety form that you should read and sign.
POINTS.11: For quad and safari excursions: guests suffering from back problems (spine/discs) and pregnant women are not allowed to participate in such excursions.
POINTS.12: Please inform your tour guide in time in case of cancellation or rebooking - For cancellations after booking and up to one day before the excursion begins, the agency reserves the following cancellation fees:
POINTS.13: For cancellations on the excursion day, nothing will be refunded.
POINTS.14: Changes in the travel itinerary are subject to short-term changes, but the character of the excursion will of course be fully preserved.
POINTS.15: For some excursions, fees must be paid on site, about which you will of course be informed by the tour guide when booking.

BUS_TRIP.TITLE: Bus Trip to Cairo or Luxor
POINTS: The day before the excursion, please order your wake-up call, breakfast box and late dinner at reception.
Take comfortable clothing, sturdy shoes, pillow, water bottle, sunscreen, sunglasses, camera, cream, money for drinks and souvenirs.
The air conditioning on the bus could get cool, so take something to wear over your clothes.
If you have booked the excursion with a flight or overnight stay, you will also need your passport or ID.
Entrances to the Mummy Room of the Museum, Tomb of Tutankhamun, and pyramid burial chambers are exclusive.

SNORKELING.TITLE: Snorkeling
POINTS: Take swimwear, beach towels from the hotel, sunglasses, cream, camera, money (drinks on the island are not included in the price), a jacket to wear over your clothes in the afternoon.
If visiting the island is not possible, an additional snorkeling session from the boat will take place instead.
Upon pickup, you will receive a safety form that you should read and sign.
Different environmental fees apply for sea excursions.

GLASS_BOAT.TITLE: Glass Bottom Boat
POINTS: Take sunscreen, glasses, water bottle and camera.

DESERT_EXCURSIONS.TITLE: Desert Excursions
POINTS: Dress comfortably, sturdy shoes, sunglasses, cream, camera, water for the journey and small change for souvenirs.
For excursions that go until evening, you need something to wear over your clothes.
Guests suffering from back problems or issues with the spine/discs as well as pregnant women are not allowed to participate in such excursions.
Quad is for one person only.
Quad riding is not permitted for persons under 16 years of age.
Upon pickup, you will receive a safety form that you should read and sign.
Camel riding is not permitted for overweight persons.
Different environmental fees apply for desert excursions.

GENERAL_NOTES.TITLE: General Notes
POINTS: Meeting point for all excursions is the entrance area in front of your hotel.
Be sure to remember to take the red copy of your excursion ticket. Your tour guide will collect this before departure.
Drinks with meals are not included in the price
Entrances to the Mummy Room of the Museum, Tomb of Tutankhamun, and pyramid burial chambers are not included in the price.
Please do not leave valuables (camera, money) in the bus during sightseeing.
Changes in the travel itinerary are subject to short-term changes, but the character of the excursion will of course be fully preserved.

EXCURSION_POLICY.RESPONSIBILITY: The responsibility for organization and implementation lies with the local agency Cairo Express Travel
EXCURSION_POLICY.CONFIRMATION: Hereby you confirm that you are booking the above-mentioned excursion with the local excursion operator CET Cairo Express Travel for the above-mentioned excursion participants. You have taken note that this is not a service and offer of the package tour operator with whom I booked my package holiday in Egypt.
EXCURSION_POLICY.TEAM_GREETING: Your CET Team wishes you a nice excursion and lots of fun!!!
EXCURSION_POLICY.CONTACT_INFO: For inquiries, special requests or complaints, please contact the address below.
